name: Dory Blossom Salad
description: Dive into the freshness with our Dory Blossom Salad, a melody of crisp greens, colorful vegetables, and tender cream dory fillet, all coming together for a low-carb, low-sugar, high-fiber delight. Perfect for those looking for a heart-healthy option that doesn't skimp on flavor. This salad brings together the best of both worlds, combining nutritional benefits with mouth-watering tastes. Ideal for anyone on a healthful journey looking for healthy, delicious recipes.

recipeInstructions.text: Wash and chop the romaine lettuce. Peel and slice the carrot. Dice the cucumber, yellow bell pepper, and green bell pepper.
recipeInstructions.name: Step 1

recipeInstructions.text: Cut the tomatoes into wedges. Prepare the extra firm tofu by cutting it into small cubes.
recipeInstructions.name: Step 2

recipeInstructions.text: Season the cream dory fillet with dried basil leaves, salt, and pepper to taste.
recipeInstructions.name: Step 3

recipeInstructions.text: Preheat a pan over medium heat and cook the dory fillet until it's golden and cooked through, about 6-8 minutes each side.
recipeInstructions.name: Step 4

recipeInstructions.text: Prepare the banana blossom/flower by slicing it thinly and soaking it in water mixed with a bit of vinegar to prevent browning.
recipeInstructions.name: Step 5

recipeInstructions.text: In a large bowl, combine the chopped romaine lettuce, sliced carrot, diced cucumber, yellow bell pepper, green bell pepper, tomato wedges, and tofu cubes.
recipeInstructions.name: Step 6

recipeInstructions.text: Add the cooked cream dory fillet and sliced banana blossom/flower to the salad mixture.
recipeInstructions.name: Step 7

recipeInstructions.text: Toss everything gently to combine. Optionally, you can add your favorite salad dressing or a squeeze of lemon juice for extra flavor.
recipeInstructions.name: Step 8
